message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product.  Given its unique value proposition, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,100,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000.

Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $950,000 is a significant gap from my valuation.  To make this work, I could come down to $1,050,000.  This feels like a fair compromise that reflects the value this product brings.
I appreciate your response, Alice. While I understand your position, I still aim to keep my expenses within my set limit. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,000,000.
